ANSWER

We reiterate our view that it is not permissible for woman to cut or trim their hair. The only exception to the rule is:

1. A woman may trim her hair on the lower end only to enhance growth, or

2. To equate the level of her hair on the lower.

The above two does not exceed a few inches. We have corresponded with Mufti Taqi Usmani Saheb and he is of the view that in general it is not permissible for woman to cut or trim their hair with the above two exception. Hereunder is his response to us in seeking clarity on his standpoint on the matter.
